China's Feb factory activity shrinks for 5th month, adding to pressure on economyChina's manufacturing activity in February contracted for a fifth straight month, an official factory survey showed on Friday, raising the pressure on policymakers to roll out further stimulus measures as factory owners struggle for orders. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 01:50:26 GMT 2HJFYPWTRJKY5MXV77I5WFVT3M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-feb-factory-activity-shrinks-5th-month-adding-Pressure-economy-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中国
Dollar steady as traders ponder Fed rate cut bets; yen shaky at 150/dlrThe dollar was steady on Friday after data showed U.S. inflation remained sticky but easing gradually, keeping alive the chance of the Federal Reserve cutting rates in June, while the yen slid back to the key 150 per dollar level. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 01:35:35 GMT 3QZR2YOKKBPAZBT2UPEG5UNZHI https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-traders-ponder-fed-rate-cut-bets-yen-shaky-150dlr-2024-03-01/Ankur Banerjee市场货币
Australia's Syrah Resources inks offtake deal with S. Korea's Posco Future MAustralia's Syrah Resources said on Friday it will supply natural graphite product from its Balama graphite operations in Mozambique to South Korean chemical and battery material maker Posco Future M . Thu, 29 Feb 2024 22:08:57 GMT 6HZJDDSRUBKA3CHP2MLCNCYUVI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/australias-syrah-resources-inks-offtake-deal-with-s-koreas-posco-future-m-2024-02-29/Reuters市场商品

China home prices likely to fall 0.9% this year; previous poll tipped growth: Reuters pollNew home prices in China are likely to fall this year due to limited effect of ongoing government support measures, a Reuters poll showed, with economists predicting the ailing market will need more than a year to bottom out. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 21:04:48 GMT Z2TRVAVA5BLHHA3ZEVCCCCBQI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-home-prices-likely-fall-09-this-year-previous-poll-tipped-growth-2024-02-29/Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo世界中国
Russian man who smuggled military technology to Russia pleads guilty in US courtA Russian man pled guilty on Thursday to U.S. charges that he smuggled large quantities of American-made, military-grade microelectronics to Russia, top U.S. justice officials said in a statement. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 20:46:53 GMT BFEGSE6L7FJTNJIKHI5NGL5E5I https://www.reuters.com/world/us/ Russian-man-who-smuggled-military-technology-Russia-pleads-guilty-us-court-2024-02-29/Reuters世界美国
Boeing agrees to $51 mln settlement for US export violations, including in ChinaBoeing said on Thursday it had reached a $51 million settlement with the U.S. State Department for numerous export violations including Chinese employees in China improperly downloading documents related to U.S. Defense Department programs. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 20:32:02 GMT APB4PY5W6JND7DDKRLK6BJWHJY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/boeing-pay-51-million-settlement-us-export-violations-2024-02-29/David Shepardson商业航空航天与国防
US trade chief: 'Complex trade-offs' needed at WTO talksU.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai said on Friday breakthroughs were still possible in overnight negotiations at the World Trade Organization, but "complex trade-offs" would be needed even for less difficult topics such as fishing. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 19:15:07 GMT YODSTO3SRVOUJHOULOJLQCI3IM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-trade-chief-complex-trade-offs-needed-wto-talks-2024-02-29/Emma Farge世界
Chinese outbound investment in EVs likely set new record in 2023Chinese outbound foreign direct investment along the electric vehicle value chain likely set a new record in 2023, a report from Rhodium Group showed, as western economies step up scrutiny of China's production-focussed, debt driven development model. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 14:05:59 GMT XJN2ZAD4FRLXXHAXFEJHEIJIPI https://www.reuters.com/business/chinese-outbound-investment-evs-likely-set-new-record-2023-2024-02-29/Joe Cash商业
Fisheries deal at WTO insufficient for Pacific islands, Fiji saysA grouping of Pacific islands, including Fiji, Papua New Guinea and the Solomon Islands, are opposing a draft deal on changes to fisheries subsidies at the World Trade Organization talks in Abu Dhabi, arguing that it does not go far enough. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 12:58:58 GMT AFGVE24LB5MALLRKSAJBBUHXIY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fisheries-deal-wto-insufficient-pacific-islands-fiji-says-2024-02-29/Alexander Cornwell世界亚太地区
